attributes.action: Stop the Unlawful Killing of Foxes By use of Hounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite 'Foxhunting' by use of hounds being made illegal in this country 'Foxhunters' are still killing foxes by use of hounds and using the excuse that the hounds are simply picking up on the scent of foxes by mistake.This results in the extremely cruel painful death of these animals. If foxes are continually being killed by hounds let the organisers (knowing it is illegal) face criminal charges and justice and not have the use of excuses that mock the law and the general publics intellect.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign a similar petition that is already live: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/FoxHunting1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
